statements: SELECT * FROM customer_contacts;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_contacts WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM customer_contacts WHERE customer_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM customer_contacts WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Doe%';
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_contacts ORDER BY customer_name DESC;

SELECT * FROM customer_contacts WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_contacts WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customer_contacts ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_contacts WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_total FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT first_name, last_name, order_total FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE order_total > 1000 ORDER BY order_total DESC;

SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';

SELECT customers.customer_name, phone_numbers.phone_number, emails.email_address FROM customers INNER JOIN phone_numbers ON customers.customer_id = phone_numbers.customer_id INNER JOIN emails ON customers.customer_id = emails.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;

SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE email_address LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT Orders.order_id, Customers.first_name, Orders.total_amount FROM Orders JOIN Customers ON Orders.customer_id = Customers.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Addresses WHERE state = 'NY' ORDER BY zip_code DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM Transactions;

SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT c.customer_name, a.street_address, a.city, a.state, a.zipcode FROM customers c JOIN addresses a ON c.customer_id = a.customer_id
SELECT c.customer_name, p.phone_number, e.email_address FROM customers c LEFT JOIN phone_numbers p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id LEFT JOIN emails e ON c.customer_id = e.customer_id
